title: Designing High-Effectiveness Learning Strategies for Adult Learners in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental scientific knowledge and basic job-related concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment. Monitoring learning engagement and achievement through enhanced formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply five high-impact learning strategies for scientific problem-solving to real-world cases within four weeks.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans and analyze execution outcomes through weekly reflective journals.
Learners can correct over 80% of errors in science experiment designs using a peer feedback system.

resources: Open Educational Resources (OER)-Based Science Experiment Kit
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
